mapper.insert: insert into xjhb_information (id, project_id, outlay, start_time, end_time, other_proof_name, other_proof, project_application, person_id, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outlay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{otherProofName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherProof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectApplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, project_id, outlay, start_time, end_time, other_proof_name, other_proof, project_application, person_id, create_time from xjhb_information where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
